channel.title: Docs on Totality
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Totality

item.title: Motivation
item.description: Becoming Planetary Thinkers As a civilization, we need to make a leap. The idea that there is a human economy separate from or above the rest of the planet, apart from nature, is simply wrong; it has also been incredibly destructive. Humans have made from the elements and energy around us many wonderful new things (and some horrific ones as well); but, even so, the entirety of the human economy is contained within the natural world.
